title: Mesa Verde: Mystery of the silent cities
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
brief_description: The ruins of a mysterious Pueblo Culture in the American South-West are probed in an attempt to reconstruct the lives and times of these fascinating people, who appeared suddenly, flourished and disappeared just as suddenly.
